title: 13 Nights of Elvira
overview: Break out the crucifix, get some garlic, and say your prayers cause Elvira's coming for a visit. Elvira takes on some of the best of the worst modern B movies like Puppet Master, Cannibal Women in the Avacodo, Jungle of Death, and Evil Bong! Skewering them in the sexy, spooky way that only she can.
